abstract: Hybrid bulldozer and terrain excavators will be monitored next year by academics and the California Air Resources Board to see if they offer significantly lowered carbon emissions.
snippet: Hybrid bulldozer and terrain excavators will be monitored next year by academics and the California Air Resources Board to see if they offer significantly lowered carbon emissions.
lead_paragraph: Hybrid technology is working its way off road, and two heavy-duty earth movers, a bulldozer and tracked excavator, are preparing for large-scale emissions tests in California.

headline.main: In California, a Final Exam for Heavy-Duty Hybrids
